name: asn-to-greenplum-ddl
description: Developed in JavaScript for [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/), this tool aims to convert ANS.1 type declarations to the closest PostgreSQL structure possible. It generates a simplistic JSON structure that maps the database structure. The JSON structure can be used to parse the ANS.1 data parser's output into a well defined text file for bulk insertions in the database.
author: Sonia Melga√ßo
